page.description: Converts a CR-LF delimited list to a comma delimited list.
page.prototype: dim result as C = crlf_to_comma(Source as C)

argument.name: Source
argument.description: A list of items, each separated by a comma.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns a comma delimited list. If *[xb:Source]* does not contain a CR-LF character, returns *[xb:Source]*.

page.discussion: The *[xb:crlf_to_comma()]* function converts a CR-LF delimited list to a comma delimited list.
page.example:
dim colors as C colors = <<%str% red orange yellow green blue purple %str%
? crlf_to_comma(colors) = "red,orange,yellow,green,blue,purple"
